title: Teemo/Darius/Veigar have to get a HARD NERVE!!!
body:
Teemo/Darius/Veigar have to get a HARD NERVE!!!

Even with the full counters of them, you can not do anything against them. This three are the biggest noob champs ingame. I want to nerve them and everybody who want that too, like the comment! Maybe it works and the LOL support cares about us.

replies.body: darius is in an extremely weak state right now. He lost so much damage after fervor got removed.

Teemo is annoying with his shrooms but that's all.

And Veigar...where do I begin. His early is weak, he can't win a 1 v 1 without hitting his E and there are multiple midlaners like Kata or Zed who can just jump out of the cage, his W is useless without the Stun of his E, he has 0 Mobility, he is squishy and is just strong when his Ult is up, he gets fed and in lategame. Still he has a hard time against assasins and high range mages.

And Darius...well, I don't know him that well.
Aha. Du hast vor 11 Minuten gegen Teemo verloren. Du bist nur wütend, weil der/die Gegner besser war/en als du (und dein Team). Bitte denk drüber nach bevor du etwas postest. Reg dich n bisschen ab.

Teemo: Ja
Darius, Veigar: Nein

Teemo ist echt zu stark und wird auch garantiert demnächst einen Nerf bekommen. 55% Winrate bei 8% Pickrate ist ein bisschen too much.
